item.title: Lake Street
item.description: About This Track Thereâ€™s a presumption that you have to get out of the city to find peace and tranquility, but for me the stretch of Lake St between Ashland and Kedzie has always been a place of respite. You feel at once in the guts of the city and at an observation point. No facades and few people on foot, it’s a uniquely sleepy part of town that for me welcomes reflection.
